Class ConfigurationLoader.JsonParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.config.ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser<java.io.InputStream>

  • Enclosing interface:
    ConfigurationLoader

    public static final class ConfigurationLoader.JsonParser
extends ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser<java.io.InputStream>
    A helper class which is able to create and fulfill a bean from a JSON string.

    2013.10.19

    • Method Detail

      • getBean

        public <T> T getBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass,
            java.io.InputStream input)
          throws ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
        Description copied from class: ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser
        Is responsible for creating a bean, and then fulfilling its fields.

        The method is supposed to skip fields available in the input, but which cannot be mapped properly to any of the created bean fields.

        Specified by:
        getBean in class ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser<java.io.InputStream>
        Parameters:
        theClass - the class the bean to be created belongs to
        input - the source which holds the bean state, and which will be parsed
        Returns:
        a valid and fulfilled bean
        Throws:
        ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException - if an error occurred during the method
        See Also:
        #setBean(Class, InputStream, Object)

      • setBean

        public <T> T setBean(java.lang.Class<T> theClass,
            java.io.InputStream input,
            T bean)
          throws ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException
        Description copied from class: ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser
        Does the same job as the #getBean(Class, InputStream) method, except that the bean is provided. the class the bean to be created belongs to
        Specified by:
        setBean in class ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationParser<java.io.InputStream>
        input - the source which holds the bean state, and which will be parsed
        bean - the bean that should be updated
        Returns:
        the provided fulfilled bean
        Throws:
        ConfigurationLoader.ConfigurationLoaderException - if an error occurred during the method
        See Also:
        #getBean(Class, InputStream)
